description: Create an SQS queue with long polling enabled and tags applied.
notes:
Enabling long polling is a strong default for SQS queues to reduce costs and improve efficiency. Without further context, tagging resources is a best practice for cost allocation and management.
[1] https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSSimpleQueueService/latest/SQSDeveloperGuide/sqs-best-practices.html.
